remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

param.name: queryOrEventClassName
param.span: 表示整個事件查詢或所要查詢事件類別名稱的字串。

span.span: The string representing either the entire event query or the name of the event class to query.

param.span: 物件會嘗試將字串剖析為有效的事件查詢。

span.span: The object will try to parse the string as a valid event query.

param.span: 如果不成功，則剖析器會假設參數表示事件類別名稱。

span.span: If unsuccessful, the parser will assume that the parameter represents an event class name.

MemberSignature.Value: public WqlEventQuery (string eventClassName, TimeSpan withinInterval);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string eventClassName, valuetype System.TimeSpan withinInterval) cil managed
Public Sub New (eventClassName As String, withinInterval As TimeSpan)
public: WqlEventQuery(System::String ^ eventClassName, TimeSpan withinInterval);

param.name: eventClassName
param.span: 要查詢的事件類別名稱。

span.span: The name of the event class to query.

param.name: withinInterval
param.span: 值，指定接收這個事件時可以接受的延遲時間。

span.span: A value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.

param.span: 這個值用於所要求的查詢沒有明確的事件提供者的狀況中，並且 WMI 必須輪詢條件。

span.span: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.

param.span: 這個間隔是事件告知必須傳遞之前所能夠等待的最長時間。

span.span: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.

summary.span: 使用指定延遲時間，為指定事件類別初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified event class, with the specified latency time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化藉由指定事件和時間範圍值，指定用於接收此事件可接受的延遲。The following example initializes a by specifying an event and a time span value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the event class to query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件查詢: 「 選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10，其中包含要 ISA Win32_Service"，其中會傳送通知的建立**Win32_Service**情況下的，輪詢間隔為 10 秒。The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service ", which sends notification of the creation of **Win32_Service** instances, with a 10-second polling interval. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the event class to query.

param.name: groupWithinInterval
param.span: WMI 傳送一個「彙總事件」 (而非多個事件) 的指定間隔。

span.span: The specified interval at which WMI sends one aggregate event, rather than many events.

param.name: groupByPropertyList
param.span: 事件類別中的屬性，事件應該根據這個屬性劃分群組。

span.span: The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.

span.span: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件查詢:"選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent，其中包含要 ISA Win32_NTLogEvent 群組內 600 TargetInstance.SourceName 由 HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15 」 可提供彙總事件，只有當的數字**Win32_NTLogEvent**超過 15 個來自相同來源的事件。The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent GROUP WITHIN 600 BY TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15" which delivers aggregate events only if the number of **Win32_NTLogEvent** events received from the same source exceeds 15. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.vb#1)]

.property instance string Condition
Public Property Condition As String
public: property System::String ^ Condition { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至指定類別事件的條件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.

value.span: 傳回 值，內含事件查詢中的條件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition or conditions in the event query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的條件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. ## 屬性值Property Value 條件會表示為字串，包含表單的一個或多個子句： \\<運算子 >\<值 > 結合邏輯運算子。The condition is represented as a string, containing one or more clauses of the form: \ \ \ combined with logical operators. \ 必須代表在此查詢中指定的事件類別上定義的屬性。\ must represent a property defined on the event class specified in this query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新和顯示的事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/cs/WqlEventQuery_Condition.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/vb/WqlEventQuery_Condition.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_EventClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_EventClassName/cs/WqlEventQuery_EventClassName.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_EventClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_EventClassName/vb/WqlEventQuery_EventClassName.vb#1)]

value.span: 傳回 ，內含要用來劃分相同型別之事件群組的事件屬性。

span.span: Returns a containing the properties in the event to be used for grouping events of the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的群組。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果沒有群組是必要項;，null否則，事件屬性名稱的集合。Null, if no grouping is required; otherwise, a collection of event property names. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新和顯示的事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的間隔。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval. ## 屬性值Property Value Null，如果沒有群組包含;否則，在 WMI 中的間隔應該群組相同類型的事件。Null, if there is no grouping involved; otherwise, the interval in which WMI should group events of the same type. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新和顯示的事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. summary.span: 根據所接收的事件數目，取得或設定要套用至事件彙總的條件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.

value.span: 根據所接收的事件數目，傳回 值，內含套用至事件彙總的條件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的群組條件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping condition. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果為 null，應套用任何彙總或沒有條件。否則，在表單的條件"NumberOfEvents\<運算子 >\<值 > 」。Null, if no aggregation or no condition should be applied; otherwise, a condition of the form "NumberOfEvents \ \". ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新和顯示的事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. .property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan WithinInterval
Public Property WithinInterval As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan WithinInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於這個查詢中的輪詢間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.

value.span: 傳回 值，內含事件查詢中所用的輪詢間隔。

span.span: Returns a value containing the polling interval used in the event query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該只設定萬一有任何*事件提供者*要求事件，而且必須 WMI 輪詢要求條件。This property should only be set in cases where there is no *event provider* for the event requested, and WMI is required to poll for the requested condition. 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的間隔。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果沒有任何輪詢涉及;，null否則，有效輪詢是否需要值。Null, if there is no polling involved; otherwise, a valid value if polling is required. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新代表查詢: 「 選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE 其中包含要 ISA 'Win32_Process' 」。The following example initializes a new that represents the query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process'". [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/cs/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/vb/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.vb#1)]
